smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function startGame appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function relayout has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.
This empty block of code can be removed.
This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionNaming
smells.description: Function names should follow the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should match the pattern: ^([a-z$][a-zA-Z$0-9]*)|(`.*`)$

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'ModsDatabase.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ModsDatabaseOpenHelper'.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (event.rawX - startX) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: event.rawX - startX
Parentheses in (event.rawY - startY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: event.rawY - startY

Parentheses in (prefs.getString("pref_mouse_mode",
            getString(R.string.pref_mouse_mode_default))!!) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: prefs.getString("pref_mouse_mode",
            getString(R.string.pref_mouse_mode_default))!!
Parentheses in (line.length - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: line.length - 1
Parentheses in (osc != null && osc.keyboardVisible) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: osc != null && osc.keyboardVisible
Parentheses in (if (enabled) 1 else 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (enabled) 1 else 0
Parentheses in (columns[3] as Long) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: columns[3] as Long

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
mods.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.jetbrains.anko.db.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.jetbrains.anko.db.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.jetbrains.anko.db.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.app.AlarmManager' is unused.
The import 'android.app.PendingIntent' is unused.
The import 'com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag' is unused.
The import 'java.io.BufferedReader' is unused.
The import 'java.io.FileInputStream' is unused.
The import 'java.io.InputStreamReader' is unused.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ModsActivity.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function onTouch has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function convertIni has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file OscAttackButton.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: APP_PREFERENCES can be a `const val`.
HIDE_CONTROLS can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class CommandlineParser defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
